author: IGN
description:
We got to play Arc System Works' newest fighting game, Marvel Tokon: Fighting Souls at EVO 2025. Mitchell Saltzman and Will Borger breakdown their impressions from going hands-on with the new fighter.

All footage captured on PS5.

#IGN #MarvelTokonFightingSouls
title: Marvel Tokon: Fighting Souls - Hands-On Impressions | EVO 2025

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Suit Reveal Teaser for Spider-Man: Brand New Day, the next cinematic installment of the MCU. Get a look at the brand-new suit for Tom Holland's Spider-Man for Spider-Man: Brand New Day starring Tom Holland, Zendaya, Jacob Batalon, Jon Bernthal (as The Punisher), Sadie Sink, Mark Ruffalo (Hulk), and more. Spider-Man: Brand New Day opens in theaters on July 31, 2026.

#SpiderManBrandNewDay #Movies #IGN
title: Spider-Man: Brand New Day - Official Suit Reveal Teaser (2026) Tom Holland, Zendaya, Mark Ruffalo

author: IGN
description:
Ever since the original Battlefield 1942 released back in the summer of 2002, EA and DICE’s large-scale multiplayer warfare series has consistently been among the most critically acclaimed and popular first-person shooters ever made. Thanks to its constant reinvention, Battlefield has felt forever fresh, cycling through a number of different eras and locations, pushing the player count to support over 100+ players on the map at once, and bolstering its core multiplayer-first design with singleplayer narratives that cover some of the grittiest aspects of warfare. All this considered, it’s really no surprise that Battlefield is still holding strong after two decades, even if it’s had a couple of missteps along the way.
Whether you're a fan of the series’ original WW2 setting, enjoy the modern warfare eras, or prefer to fight on the frontlines of Miami’s drug war, there's something in this series for everyone. But which game is the best? That’s what we’re here to find out. With the heate
title: Top 10 Best Battlefield Games Ranked

author: IGN
description: Don't miss this trailer for Killing Floor 3, a first-person action zombie shooter developed by Tripwire Interactive. Players will fight against the undead using an arsenal of weapons alone or with friends in co-op. Check out the latest trailer for the game that shows off the intense gore as the franchise's signature touch. Killing Floor 3 is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: Killing Floor 3 - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the first 20 minutes of gameplay from Ninja Gaiden: Ragebound. A game where you slice, dice, hack, slash, and any other verb you can think of where a man in a blue outfit uses a sword against bad ninjas and demons. Ninja Gaiden: Ragebound is available on PC, Switch, PlayStation and Xbox. 
Check out our full review here! - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1gfD8P0iSHM
Gameplay captured on a PC

00:00 - Prologue: Legacy
04:26 - Act 1: Path of The Ninja (Tutorial)
10:52 - Level 1
title: Ninja Gaiden: Ragebound | The First 20 Minutes of Gameplay | 4k 60FPS

title: SpongeBob SquarePants: Titans of the Tide annnounced

author: IGN
description:
Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. World Stage arrives on PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X/S on October 30, 2025. Check out the Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. World Stage trailer for the fighting game to see what to expect. Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. brings the World Stage mode, a single-player mode where you'll sharpen your skills against a wide variety of unique rivals and boss characters that stand in your way. Defeat them to level up and continue your journey to become the strongest player in the world.​ Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. also features an improved training mode and cross-play support across PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox, and Steam, all supported by Rollback Netcode.

#VirtuaFighter5REVO #EVO2025 #Gaming
title: Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. World Stage - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out the Publisher Announcement Trailer for Aggelos 2, a long-awaited sequel to the hit 2D action platformer developed by Wonderboy Bobi. Players will set out to master two powerful forms after the gods of light remain in peril in the great battle against the gods of darkness. Engage in combat against challenging enemies, twisting paths, and thought-provoking puzzles. Aggelos 2 is launching in 2026 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintedo Switch, and PC (Steam).
title: Aggelos 2 - Official Publisher Announcement Trailer
